issue.title: Fix #176432 biolink.webtena.com
issue.body:
## Fix #176432 


**Pull Request Summary:**
Resolved issue [#176432]  by implementing a solution that is stopping the anti-adblock script before it activates.



**Checklist for a Valid Pull Request:**
- [x] This submission is neither an advertisement nor a bug report.
- [x] My contribution adheres to the project's [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [filter syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters).
- [x] I have thoroughly reviewed my changes.
- [x] My updates maintain the integrity of websites, applications, and file structures.

**Problem Addressed by This Pull Request:**
The pull request resolves an issue [#176432] where AdGuard was being detected on websites, potentially leading to functionality disruptions. 




<details>
<summary>Screenshots</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/73603712/101b2834-a0dc-4e59-8ece-723eb4bd19c7)

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/73603712/d4879c16-f03c-434e-8411-6373072573c9)

</details>

**Additional Notes:**

**Similar Pull Request Notice:**
>This pull request is similar to a previous fix for issue [#176383](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176383), which addressed a timeout prevention mechanism using the presence of this code: 
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176383#issuecomment-2040012679
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/73603712/ac251baa-c2cc-4ad5-8ac2-0297826cb47c)





- [ ] Unblocked advertisements or residual ad elements.
- [ ] Malfunctioning websites or applications.
- [x] Detection of AdGuard on a website.
- [ ] Overlooked analytics or trackers.
- [ ] Social media integrations such as share, like, or tweet buttons.
- [ ] General annoyances including pop-ups and cookie notifications.
- [ ] Routine filter maintenance.

**Consent:**
- [x] I confirm that this pull request is free of private information and meets all outlined conditions.

comment.body:
Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`

I tested in AdGuard, and these filters from uBO work fine

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2023.txt#L1582-L1589
```
#@#.banner-ads
#@#.banner_ads
#@#.ad-zone
#@#.ad-space
##.banner-ads:not(.textads)
##.banner_ads:not(.textads)
##.ad-zone:not(.textads)
~nieru.net##.ad-space:not(.textads):not(.adbox)
```

from chp adblock:

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5123
https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5125
```
#@#.ad-unit
~lamire.jp##.ad-unit:not(.text-ad):not(.textads)
```

comment.body:
Hello, @Yuki2718. It's been a long time.


There have been some changes to the site.

1. The tracker domain has changed.
`astral.nicovideo.jp` -> `stella.nicovideo.jp`
Videos can no longer be viewed if the tracker is blocked.
This can be bypassed using the noopjson rule.
`||stella.nicovideo.jp/v2/watch/member.json$redirect=noopjson`
`||stella.nicovideo.jp/v1/watch/nonmember.json$redirect=noopjson`
<details>
<summary>Screenshot</summary>

![タイトルなし](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/86018494/eeec1f09-4564-4a0c-9889-1574f239bde7)

</details>

2. There is nicoad tracking in the following directories.
`https://www.nicovideo.jp/video_top`
`https://www.nicovideo.jp/video_top/genre/entertainment`
Tracker:
`||nicoad.nicovideo.jp/v1/instream/tracking/`
`||nicoad.nicovideo.jp/v1/tracking/`
<details>
<summary>Screenshot</summary>

![タイトルなし2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/86018494/09286776-f465-495b-9949-9caab02501aa)

</details>

3. Also, there is a known tracker that is only blocked by AdGuard, can you please add these to EasyPrivacy?
Thank you.
`||nvapi.nicovideo.jp/v1/bandit-machine/`
`||nicovideo.jp/api/logger?`
`||nicolive.cdn.nimg.jp/relive/sp/browser-logs.*.js`
`||nicolive.cdn.nimg.jp/relive/sp/trackingService.*.js`

comment.body:
>When trying to block an Ad element on MegaUp website using adguard extension, the pop-up window is shifted down such that the user cannot select the "preview" and "Block" buttons.
>
>Go to download any file from MegaUp website, Ads will be present below "wait to download button," right click and choose to "block ads on this website... ," pop-up window will not display correctly.

It seems that it has been fixed in AdGuard extension 4.3.44 beta version.

comment.body:
Не повторяется, сайт не блокируем. Включите также фильтры мобильной рекламы и русский, затем обновите их (подождите около одной минуты), очистите данные браузера, затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

> При добавлении сайта в белый список его все равно блокирует AdGuard.

В этом случае попробуйте переустановить AdGuard. Если все так и останется, свяжитесь с support@adguard.com.

В последнее время она стала особенно назойливой, были случаи появления даже всплывающих окон. Проблема сохраняется во всёх трёх браузерах, установленных на телефоне ( Яндекс, Google Chrome и Opera). У меня также установлено, помимо Adguard Content Blocker, приложение Adguard, но проблему это не решает. comment.body:
Реклама блокируется корректно. Какой сертификат использует браузер? Фильтрация для приложения, в том числе по HTTPS, включена в настройках?
Для начала попробуйте оставить только фильтры Адгард вместе с указанными расширениями `Отключить AMP`, `AdGuard Extra`. Затем обновите фильтры, очистите данные браузера, перезапустите его. Также можно проверить сайт в Хром - в нем будет видно какой сертификат используется на странице.

issue.title: Altumcode anti-Adblock
issue.body:
Applies to 

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176432

and

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176383

   
   Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`
      
        Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`

I tested in AdGuard, and these filters from uBO work fine

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2023.txt#L1582-L1589
```
#@#.banner-ads
#@#.banner_ads
#@#.ad-zone
#@#.ad-space
##.banner-ads:not(.textads)
##.banner_ads:not(.textads)
##.ad-zone:not(.textads)
~nieru.net##.ad-space:not(.textads):not(.adbox)
```

from chp adblock:

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5123
https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5125
```
#@#.ad-unit
~lamire.jp##.ad-unit:not(.text-ad):not(.textads)
```

_Originally posted by @D4niloMR in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176449#issuecomment-2041663967_

none

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

1. <comment>
Browser: Firefox mobile 124.2.0

Ublock origin version: 1.57.0

Android version: miui 14.0.13.0

Hello. While I scroll Facebook home in the browser often it goes back enough to send to the previous post I've seen. It does the reverse thing if I try to scroll back, jumping forth.

issue.title: Altumcode anti-Adblock

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
Applies to 

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176432

and

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176383

   
   Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`
      
        Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`

I tested in AdGuard, and these filters from uBO work fine

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2023.txt#L1582-L1589
```
#@#.banner-ads
#@#.banner_ads
#@#.ad-zone
#@#.ad-space
##.banner-ads:not(.textads)
##.banner_ads:not(.textads)
##.ad-zone:not(.textads)
~nieru.net##.ad-space:not(.textads):not(.adbox)
```

from chp adblock:

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5123
https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5125
```
#@#.ad-unit
~lamire.jp##.ad-unit:not(.text-ad):not(.textads)
```

_Originally posted by @D4niloMR in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176449#issuecomment-2041663967_

comment.body: Seems to be working fine on my end. I've exchanged the rules, update should be available soon.

issue.title: Altumcode anti-Adblock
issue.body:
Applies to 

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176432

and

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176383

   
   Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`
      
        Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`

I tested in AdGuard, and these filters from uBO work fine

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2023.txt#L1582-L1589
```
#@#.banner-ads
#@#.banner_ads
#@#.ad-zone
#@#.ad-space
##.banner-ads:not(.textads)
##.banner_ads:not(.textads)
##.ad-zone:not(.textads)
~nieru.net##.ad-space:not(.textads):not(.adbox)
```

from chp adblock:

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5123
https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5125
```
#@#.ad-unit
~lamire.jp##.ad-unit:not(.text-ad):not(.textads)
```

_Originally posted by @D4niloMR in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176449#issuecomment-2041663967_

comment.body: @D4niloMR I’ve created a new issue to address this idea

issue.title: using adguard mobile ads filter makes Facebook scroll jump back

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

none

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

m.facebook.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

EasyPrivacy, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### Social Widgets

Fanboy's Social Blocking List

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, EasyList Cookie List

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

EasyList Italy

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Browser: Firefox mobile 124.2.0

Ublock origin version: 1.57.0

Android version: miui 14.0.13.0.TKOEUVF

Hello. While I scroll Facebook home in the browser often it goes back enough to send to the previous post I've seen. It does the reverse thing if I try to scroll back, jumping forth. Disabling adguard mobile ads filter this behaviour stops.

Looks like its related to ads not being shown but not correctly handled, I could be wrong though.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~90 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~90 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

comment.body:
Not reproduced with AdGuard filters on my end.
Try to leave only them, clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Также рекомендуется отключить сторонние блокировщики рекламы и установить AdGuard Extra.

---

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: Cleanup duplicate rules in GermanFilter

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

There are multiple duplicate rules in the filters.

```
##.dm-slot__skyContainer::before
##.fp-powerstories-embed-ad-tag
##.mj-pf-widget
##body .code-block
##div[class^="adunit-container"]
##div[data-b-title*="(werb"]
##div[id^="mrec"]
##div[id^="werbung"]
##div[style="min-height:250px;"]
##iframe[src^="https://embed.contentverticals.de/"]
###dban1
###pricehitsTextTeaser
#$?##CR > div[id^="G3"]:matches-css(grid-template-rows: /^\d+px/) { grid-template-rows: auto !important; }
#?#.id-SiteMain > .id-g--oneCol:has(> div > div > div[data-id-advertdfpconf])
#?#article:has(> .teaser__text-content > .ad-labels)
```

### Proposed solution

Consolidate redundant rules if possible.

### Additional information


These rules are grouped by domain, so I was unable to determine whether the rules should be merged.
If necessary, please merge the rules on the maintainer side or send a comment on the pull request.
Here are some examples of such rules:
```
###container_banner
###fh-inside-bottom
###platzierung
###rightbar > .powered
###wa_widget
##.entry-content > .aawp
##.nfy-sebo-ad
##.rtli-master-ad
##.size-300x250
```

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~90 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.
